item.title: Sailing Rigs
Interview Coder Just Leaked Full Names and Companies of All SWEs Who Cheated For Virality
item.description:
Interview Coder just leaked their users names and where they got offers. I used Interview Coder and got blacklisted from my dream company. So I made a video a couple months ago disproving all their undetectability claims on their website. But this time, I have something even better. They were actually stupid enough to dox all their users on the home page of their website of all places.
Interview Coder is the least legit AI product of all time and they are about to be sued into oblivion. Their "lifetime access" isn't going to exist once they are bankrupt from these candidates suing them for leaking all their personal information. Interview Coder leaked their users' names, compensation details, home addresses and more. The funny thing is, this isn't even their first data breach. Last year, they left their API keys exposed in a public Github repo.
Timestamps 00:00:00 | Interview Coder Exposes Users' Identities 00:00:14 | Interview Coder Reveals Current Amazon SWE Who Cheated 00:01:10 | Interview Coder Reveals FlipKart SWE Who Cheated 00:01:34 | Microsoft SWE Cheater Revealed 00:02:00 | NVIDIA SWE Cheater Exposed and Blacklisted 00:02:48 | IBM Cheater Exposed and Blacklisted 00:03:12 | Interview Coder Selling User Data to HackerRank 00:03:35 | Apple SWE Caught Cheating with Interview Coder 00:03:47 | Interview Coder CEO Brags About Revealing Cheaters on Twitter
#interviewcoder #cluely #roylee
